official_title: Relating to the tariff treatment of woven fabrics of carded wool or carded fine animal hair, of woven fabrics of combed wool or combed fine animal hair, and of certain gauzes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment of certain: (1) woven fabrics of carded wool or carded fine animal hair; (2) woven fabrics of combed wool or of combed fine animal hair; and (3) gauzes.

titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of woven fabrics of carded wool or carded fine animal hair, of woven fabrics of combed wool or combed fine animal hair, and of certain gauzes.
